channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Arigato Autoresponder and Newsletter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Arigato Autoresponder and Newsletter

item.title: CVE-2023-0543|2024-08-02T05:17:49.592Z -- unknown -- arigato%20autoresponder%20and%20newsletter
item.description: The Arigato Autoresponder and Newsletter WordPress plugin before 2.1.7.2 does not sanitize and escape some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
